title:
Equating Inv-Quinv formulas for the $q$-Whittaker and modified
  Hall-Littlewood functions
abstract:
We explain the equality between the two sets of formulas for $q$-Whittaker
functions and modified Hall-Littlewood functions obtained by Haglund, Haiman
and Loehr - the Inv formula and Ayyer, Mandelshtam and Martin - the Quinv
formula by use of weighted path symmetric functions introduced by Carlsson and
Mellit.
